text: gen tte yaru ga i. `Ten to ji no omo wa daredearu no ka.' Itte yaru ga i. `Arra de ara reru.' Itte yaru ga i. `Anata gata wa kare no soto ni, jibun jishin ni sae-eki mo gai mo motarasenai mono-tachi o hogo-sha to suru no ka.' Itte yaru ga i. `Mojin to seigan-sha wa onajidearu no ka. Mata ankoku to komyo to wa onajidearu no ka. Kare-ra wa arra ga sozo sa reta yona tsukura reta mono o, kare to doi ni haisuru. Sore de kare-ra ni wa sozo no imi ga utagawashiku natta no ka.'
